channel.title: Hey guys, I'm Tiago
channel.description: Recent content on Hey guys, I'm Tiago

item.title: Hi guys
item.description: My name is Tiago Rodrigues. I come from a little place in Portugal called Milhazes, and my goal in life is to try and learn as much as possible from everything. Some say that might be a bit too ambitious but hey, doesn’t hurt to try, right? That’s probably why I started this little page as well, to try and create a record of what I am doing, where I am and share a bit of my life with anyone that might be interested (hey mom, yes I’m fine).
